Text:
nice upload!

dirt is my alltime fav when it comes to rally games. enjoyed every version... though i have to admit that i like the originals most. 4, dirt 1 and 2.

keep it up!
You forgot tho mention the password on the zipped file...
Can  you guys re-release that thing you  did for civ 4? The one with all the mods and expansions packs, without image mounting?

Asks to fill a spammy survey to get the password to the rar file.
SCAM SCAM SCAM *****
